Description:
Everything at Your Fingertips
Whether you are looking for an ideal location to reside or the perfect investment, this property should be on top of your inspection list.
Featuring:
- Spacious lounge room.
- 2 generous size bedrooms with built in robes.
- Gas ducted heating
- Good size backyard.
- Single lock up garage.
- Great private pergola/patio area.
Short walk to Cranbourne Train Station, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, bus service at your door step and close to Cranbourne Primary and Secondary School.
Call SP Shagi 0413076585 for all enquiries or to inspect as this won't last!!!

Description:
The possibilities are endless
Nestled in a fantastic pocket in central Cranbourne sits this lovely 3
bedroom home offering generous living space as well as a convenient
lifestyle. On approximately 617m2 this home is perfectly suited to anyone
looking to secure their first home, investors or even those wanting to
downsize.
Features include:
- Potential to sub-divide for 2 nd dwelling (STCA)
- Large light filled Master bedroom with a ceiling fan & triple built in
robe
- A recently updated kitchen which comes complete with stainless steel
appliances including a dishwasher, an over-sized fridge recess &
ample cupboard space
- Two separate living areas – both with ceiling fans and one
showcasing a fantastic wood fired combustion heater to suit year
round comfort
- 1.5 car garage plus a large garden shed for ease of storing all those
extras
- Side access via double gates providing more than enough room to
park the caravan or boat
- Further features include: new flooring/carpets, fresh paint, low
maintenance gardens.
Centrally located close to parklands & child care centres with easy access
to schools such as Cranbourne West Primary School in addition to
Cranbourne train station this is the perfect choice for anyone wanting a
peaceful, low maintenance lifestyle!
Insights: 1 Tongola Court, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2018 and 165 other 3 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
Buy This Unit and Get A House! Room for 2 Cars & a Boat or Caravan!
Perfect location in the heart of Cranbourne! Close to several schools, Cranbourne Shopping centres and all amenities, this home is ideal for young families!
Stunning street appeal, be welcomed by a spacious lounge room with soothing neutral colour tones throughout complimented by elegant feature walls, with abundance of light in every room. Beautifully polished tiles flowing from the lounge room to the meals area complete with a split system, charming and modern kitchen with ample cupboards and a lovely splash back.
This warm home comprises 2 bedrooms with a modern bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles and separate toilet. Outside you are greeted with a spacious and low maintenance backyard, perfect for the kids!
Enjoy this appealing home with its immaculate presentation and unique style, offering an abundance of opportunities for young families or investors !
Additional Features:
- Double Carport
- Room for boat or caravan
- Block size of 332m2 Approx
- No Body Corporate
- Gas ducted heating
- Split System Heating/cooling unit

ATTENTION INVESTORS ONLY!
This 3 bedroom home is located in the highly desirable central Cranbourne within walking distance to the train station, shops & parks. Complete with a ready made tenant looking for a long term stay, this property is set on its own block with its own street frontage and no body corporate. Featuring recently renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, spacious lounge/dining, three large bedrooms, central bathroom, gas heating, garage and a low maintenance yard. The perfect entry into the market or addition to your investment portfolio, it represents great value & won't be around long at this price. Contact Daniel today!!

Description:
Hard work done, now enjoy!
FIXED D8 SALE: 8/1/2018 (unless sold prior)
If you are looking for a property that you can just move in and enjoy, then this is the Perfect one for you!
- 2 bedrooms with built in robes, open plan family & meals (or study), formal lounge.
- Stunning kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops and designer s/s appliances & dishwasher, modern bathroom with oversized shower and vanity.
- Features ducted heating, air conditioning, down lights, floating timber floors, sun shade and block roller blinds.
- Outside you will find a single closed off carport with roller door, beautifully landscaped gardens.
- No body corporate fees, front unit of two on block, side and front yard and so much more.
Nothing has been left untouched with this lovely unit. Positioned in a well sought after location within a short walk to Cranbourne train station, schools, shops and Westernport Freeway. An inspection is sure to impress!
PHOTO ID IS REQUIRED ON ALL INSPECTIONS
PLEASE NOTE: S/Steel Appliances, Dishwasher, Hot Water System will all be installed prior to settlement.
“Selling? You’ll be SOLD with our $8,800 Success Package“

Description:
Nest or Invest
This neat 3 bedroom home is perfect for the first home buyer wanting to step into a growing market, or an ideal investment property for those wanting to expand or start their portfolio, on a huge 715sqm block (approx.) walking distance to public transport and just a short drive to the Thompson Park Shopping Centre this one is bursting with opportunity.
Inside is an easy floorplan consisting of 3 bedrooms, including spacious master bedroom with a family, dual-access bathroom. A huge kitchen with stainless appliances and separate dining area. The main living area is complemented by a cozy wood fire and split system heating/cooling.
Outside is a spacious back yard with established trees and pergola for outdoor entertaining, along with an oversized single garage - big enough for a car plus lots of storage.

Description:
New beginnings
This lovely, freshly painted three bedroom family home is located in a quiet court in a central pocket of Cranbourne. Whether you are searching for your first home, down-sizing or looking for your next investment, this is a great opportunity not to be missed.
Features:
- Three good sized bedrooms which will comfortably home queen or double beds and all including built-in robes
- A generously sized separate lounge room perfect for enjoying some much-needed family time
- Spacious kitchen with loads of cupboard space adjoining family meals area
- Step outside to the covered entertaining zone suitable for all occasions which leads out to the rear yard providing plenty of room for kids and pets to play
- Updated central bathroom showcasing a stylish over-sized shower
- Other features include: gas heating, downlights, NBN access, a single carport with remote roller door and rear access to the entertainment area as well as mature, low maintenance gardens
Shopping is a breeze with Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Hunt Club Village Shopping Centre & Springhill Plaza all close by in addition to schools, medical & childcare centers. Don't miss out on a fantastic opportunity to make this home your new beginning!

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE: This is entry level buying at its best! Whether you are a first timer looking to break into the market or an investor keen to secure a property in a thriving location 5 Bourke Road should be an instant addition to your short list! Securely positioned behind lockable gates and fronted by established gardens the home is instantly recognisable from the street thanks to its vibrant facade.
Step inside and be greeted by a functional floorplan consisting of a spacious lounge room as well as a separate meals area that adjoins the renovated kitchen with an upright oven/stove.
There are 3 bedrooms that all feature ceiling fans and built in wardrobes plus an updated family bathroom, separate toilet and a full laundry.
Additional extras include LED lighting throughout and a projector screen, whilst ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a split system air conditioner will all help to control Melbourne's unpredictable climate!
Outside there's a covered deck for year round entertaining plus a huge garage sized shed/workshop ideal for those wanting a man cave or as extra storage space for the home based business. Don't forget the lengthy driveway leading to the oversized carport and the roomy backyard complete with fish pond and fruit trees all shaded by a majestic mature pine tree. The solar panels are sure to be an instant money saver as well!
If you believe in the age old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location then you won't be disappointed! Within walking distance to the local bus stop, Cranbourne train station, Camms Road/Sandhurst shopping centres, childcare facilities, public/private schooling and medical/dental clinics!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW (PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS)!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
IT'S ALL ABOUT LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION WITH THIS BEAUTY!
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL - Its all about location, location, location and land size with this property! A whopping 968sqm flat block, ripe for development, first home buyer looking for their first project or incredible investment opportunity. Built in 1984, is this brick veneer dwelling on a slab, 3 generous sized bedrooms all with BIR's, master with full en suite, formal lounge with lovely open fire place, open plan kitchen/family/meals area leading to enormous back yard with so much potential and including a separate DLUG with separate security alarm system. This home offers an abundance of opportunities for the astute purchaser. The canvas is ready and waiting. Damian Court is an absolutely fabulous location and so close to all Cranbourne amenities.
Added internal and external features include;
* Approximately 13.8 sq under roof line
* Approximately 968 sqm land
* Two living areas including formal lounge
* Open plan living
* Stainless steel upright stove
* Dishwasher
* Air conditioner
* Master with full en suite
* Outdoor paved area
* Low maintenance front and rear gardens
* Established fruit trees
* Thompson Parkway Shopping Centre and Cranbourne Homemaker Centre is only a few minutes' drive away
* Easy access to Western Port Highway and Eastlink Fwy
* 8 x 200w solar panels
Cranbourne Central
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the recently renovated Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES.

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY
Home to the Cranbourne Race Track, Casey RACE, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, the Homemaker Centre. Complete with a great range of primary and secondary schools both public and private. Driving distance to some of Casey's best shopping malls including Fountain Gate and Casey Central - you name it, Casey has got it! With 2 train stations nearby Cranbourne has grown into a bustling centre for those living in the South East corridor with easy access to highways and freeways that take you directly to Melbourne.
The property was purpose-built to entertain so if that's what you are looking to do, this is the one!
From the front of the property the first thing you see is the expansive wrap around decking and large front door, giving the home a feeling of class and style. Open the door and the magic starts to happen. The entranceway opens up to a feature staircase that leads to the master suite, but more on that later.
To the left the home opens up to an expansive lounge and day area designed to angle towards the stacked doors, which let home breathe and come alive on a summer's day. The entertainer's kitchen with granite bench tops contains all high-end appliances including Ilve oven and double-draw dishwasher. Cook up a storm while watching the kids play football in the backyard. And while you're at it, ask the barman to make you up an espresso martini in the built in bar!
The theatre room comes complete with its own bathroom, which also has access to outside, perfect if you want to drop a spa on the deck outside, "hint hint". The deck itself is huge. It overlooks the entire rear yard, and is complete with its own double shade sails for a little respite from the midday sun. There is a dedicated barbecue area for those summer barbecues too, complete with gas connection.
The home itself comprises four bedrooms and a study. The master suite comes complete with ensuite and hidden walk through wardrobes - oversized and highlighted with bench seats and the extra storage they provide. All four bedrooms are a great size with built in wardrobes. The study comes complete with its own built in cupboards and shelving.
In the winter months you may not want to spend the days on the deck, so you can use the formal lounge room, complete with its own gas feature fireplace. This house has it all.
We could go on forever, so we'll list some more of the highlights here:
- Evaporative cooling and ducted heating
- Double garage with internal access
- Separate shed or potential man cave adjacent to the garage
- Rear access for boats, trailers and trucks
- All on a sought after 1749m2 approx. block

Description:
Investing, starting out or just need your own space? This one’s for you!
Set amongst established and mature homes, 4 Lillian Ave Cranbourne offers an abundance of opportunities, its old world charm almost ready for you to move into, with a bit of TLC to make to better than new. Set on a large block of land of 615m2 (approx.) block that STCA subdividable for you to build a unit out the back.
Offering 3 good sized light and airy bedrooms and 2 living areas you can easily make this a comfortable family home or sound investment for many years to come. A central kitchen will be the hub of your home with good storage and bench space. Leading into meals area with, stepping outside you will find a large 2 car garage, to the side, lush lawns, mature garden beds and plenty of room for everyone to enjoy their new home.
Such a rarity for a property with this much potential to come onto the market don't miss out contact me directly to arrange an inspection.
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes. Located close to public transport, walking distance to schools and shops. Get in now and make this home yours!

Description:
Smart and Stylish!
This wonderful 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom property features a sleek sense of design and style that flow effortlessly from start to finish. A soft neutral colour palette is complimented by the warmth of the polished timber floors to create the perfect contemporary family home.
Set to impress from the first glance, the landscaped gardens and modern two storey facade greet you from the street. Enter through the double doors to find the spacious living room with feature angled window bay and high ceilings. The three additional bedrooms, also located downstairs, have large built in robes and access to the family bathroom with bath. Other features of the home include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED lighting throughout, an alarm system and security CCTV.
Uniquely designed and located on the upper level, creating a feeling of space and openness is the heart of the home, the kitchen, meals and family zone. The stylish kitchen offers stainless steel appliances; 4 burner gas cook top, electric oven and dishwasher as well as a modern glass splashback and bespoke curved stone bench. The fantastic amenities of this home donâ??t finish there. Another large living zone and a splendid balcony offer the perfect place to relax with a cup of tea or glass of wine. Also located upstairs is the master suite which includes plenty of robe space and a full en-suite with his and hers vanities and a large shower. Head outdoors to find neatly landscaped gardens, a double garage, storage shed and a brilliant pergola which provides the ideal space for barbeques and additional outdoor living.
Well positioned near Barton Primary School, St Peterâ??s College and Cranbourne West Primary School, close to numerous parks including the beautiful Royal Botanic Gardens Cranbourne and only minutes to Cranbourne Park shopping amenities and right across the road from Ranfurlie Golf Course, this is the perfect opportunity for the growing family or savvy investor. Call us today for a tour of this brilliant property.

Description:
5 BEDROOMS, 3 LIVING, 664m2 BLOCK - CARLISLE PARK ESTATE
(217403) This beautiful house set on a huge 664 m2 block has many features including 5 generous sized bedrooms
on offer here just minutes' walk to shopping centers, public transport, schools and medical facilities.
Features include: ensuite & WIR to master, huge living room, excellent kitchen complete with stainless steel
gas H/plate with new 700 Smeg stainless steel oven, new dishwasher & massive bench space.
Home also offers cinema/rumpus room, stunning bathroom, ample storage cupboards, ducted heating, 2 split-system air conditioners, plus heaps of other extras.
Outside the home offers a lovely 8mX 4m
alfresco area perfect for a BBQ and family get together, double garage and side access for the trailer/caravan and great sized backyard.
All on a 664m2 block this home offers an endless list of opportunities and possibilities.
Carlisle Park Estate offers beautifully built modern homes close to Cranbourne Home Maker center which includes Bunnings as well as eateries and Specialist Shops, Carlisle Primary school, Child care center, Doctors surgery, 24/7 Gymnasium and Springhill Shopping Centre on Thompson Road. The estate is also a short drive to Casey Race, ample sports facilities, easy access to Monash Freeway and Merinda Park Train Station & Public transport.
Don't miss out on this one!!
Open for Inspection by appointment only. Call John Lauretta directly on - 0421088646

Description:
Attention First home buyers & Investors!
Nestled on a generous 650m2 (approx) block in a near central location of Cranbourne, this property offers you a great opportunity to make an important investment in your future. It's only a short walk from local schools, shops and 5 minutes drive to Cranbourne station & Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre.
This well-built brick house leaves investors or owners to do nothing to make it your home.
- 3 Bedrooms, 1Bath.
- Big Lounge.
- Separate Dining.
- Ducted Heating and Evaporative Cooling.
- Large storage shed and Big Backyard.
- Outdoor Area.
- Security Window Rolling Shutters.
- Security Alarm & NBN.
- Separately built generous size kids day care / entertaining area.
Come one come all, this beauty will not last past the first open for inspection, or you call book an immediate inspection by calling Vikram Dhankhar on 0430392918.
